segments.text: I keep watching the woman, trying to understand her lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, diligently drying her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally flowing over the front of the sink, right past her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in a growing puddle, yet she shows no sign of feeling it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how absorbed someone can be in a task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it a bit disgusting, the way the clean water is just being wasted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the water bill and the mess this will create.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so close to the children, too, yet completely oblivious to their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't heard the sounds of their climbing or reaching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me angry, this level of negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet domestic scene is a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer irony of her 'cleaning' while a flood happens is incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains an island of calm in a sea of impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
